ci.description: Full CI pipeline (all checks in parallel where possible)

dev-tauri.description: Run Tauri in development mode (software rendering for WebKitGTK compatibility)
dev-tauri.command: cd crates/oya-tauri && WEBKIT_DISABLE_DMABUF_RENDERER=1 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 cargo tauri dev

install.command: mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && cargo build --release && cp target/release/oya ~/.local/bin/oya && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/oya && echo '✅ Installed oya to ~/.local/bin/oya'
